name: Bromfenac Ophthalmic Solution, 0.07%
indications: bromfenac ophthalmic solution , 0.07 % indicated treatment postoperative inflammation reduction ocular pain patients undergone cataract surgery .
contraindications: instill one drop affected eye daily beginning 1 day prior surgery , continued day surgery , first 14 days post-surgery . ( 2.1 )
warningsAndPrecautions: bromfenac ophthalmic solution , 0.07 % supplied white opaque ldpe plastic bottle white translucent ldpe dropper gray opaque hdpe plastic cap follows : • 1.6 ml 5 ml container ( ndc 60505-1006-1 ) • 3 ml 5 ml container ( ndc 60505-1006-2 ) storage : store 20ºc 25ºc ( 68ºf 77ºf ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] .
indications_original: Bromfenac Ophthalmic Solution, 0.07% is indicated for the treatment of postoperative inflammation and reduction of ocular pain in patients who have undergone cataract surgery.
contraindications_original: Instill one drop into the affected eye once daily beginning 1 day prior to surgery, continued on the day of surgery, and through the first 14 days post-surgery. ( 2.1 )
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Bromfenac Ophthalmic Solution, 0.07% is supplied in a white opaque LDPE plastic bottle with a white translucent LDPE dropper and gray opaque HDPE plastic cap as follows:
                  • 1.6 mL in a 5 mL container (NDC 60505-1006-1)
                  • 3 mL in a 5 mL container (NDC 60505-1006-2)
                  
                     Storage: Store at 20ºC to 25ºC (68ºF to 77ºF) [See USP Controlled Room Temperature].
